body.$description: Font of the Oblique Design System

heading.$description: Font of the Oblique Design System

code.$description: For code and design system figma documentation.

emphasis_low.$description: Use where it is obvious that it is link and no need for additional typographical emphasis such as underline.

superNarrow.$description:
For font sizes 4xl, 5xl, 6xl for a more compact visual appearance. 
Has to be convertered to em!

narrower.$description:
For font size 3x for a more compact visual appearance.
Has to be convertered to em!

narrow.$description:
For font sizes 2xl for a more compact visual appearance.
Has to be convertered to em!

normal.$description:
Default letter spacing for body and labels.
Has to be convertered to em!

wide.$description:
For buttons for a more confortable visual appearance
Has to be convertered to em!
